Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
StudentsContainer.StudentNumberReachedListener, Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements StudentsContainer.StudentNumberReachedListener, Serializable
This class models a player of the game, storing all the information of the board

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String nickname, Tower towerColor, int towersCount, StudentsContainer entrance)
      Create a player
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname choose by the client
      towerColor - color of the towers of this player
      towersCount - number of towers at the beginning of the game
      entrance - randomly picked entrance

  • Method Details

    • canPlayAssistantCard

      public boolean canPlayAssistantCard(AssistantCard card)
      Check if this player can play the given card. In other words return true if the player hasn't played the card yet.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to test
      Returns:
      whether this user can play the given card

      Parameters:
